    public abstract class AbstractStratBtn<C>
extends PersonalJButton<C>
implements StratObj<BtnStrategy<C,AbstractStratBtn<C>,PlayerState>>
    This abstract class implements a button ables to use strategy to modify its behaviour
    Author:
    Alessandro
